# DNA Methylation analyses with Illumina Probes

This file contains codes for methylation analyses reperformed for this study: https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC10300436/

The objective is to make better sense of epigenomic changes in mice related to the Gulf War disease

## Prepare setup

```r
library(BiocManager)
BiocManager::install("sesame")

library(sesame)
library(sesameData)

sessionInfo()
```

## Acquire array metadata

```r
sesameDataCache() # run only the first time
```

## Normalize array data and compute methylation (beta) values

```r
new_betas <- openSesame("data/raw")
```

## Load data from previous analysis

```r
metadata <- readRDS("data/normalized/samples.RDS")

original_processed <- readRDS("data/normalized/data_sesame.RDS")
original_betas <- original_processed$beta
```

## Compare methylation values between new and previous analyses

```r

# Check 1
new_betas["cg00101675_BC21", "208491450001_R01C01"]
original_betas["cg00101675_BC21", "ET0557BJGWI26"]a

# Check 2
new_betas["cg00531009_BC21", "208491450001_R01C01"]
original_betas["cg00531009_BC21", "ET0557BJGWI26"]
```
